attributes.action: An Enquiry into the use of the UK civil service and wasted millions of public money used to fund the Scottish Government's separation agenda in 2014
attributes.additional_details:
An enquiry into the use of public money to pursue an SNP agenda to end the United Kingdom during 2014 must be conducted immediately and also into the impartiality of the Civil Service operating in Scotland, as they were the ones who concocted the Scottish Government's highly biased and misleading 'White Paper'.

Sign now, we need answers.
